SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.geometry

Class Face

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.util.Triple<Vector3>
civitas.celestis.geometry.Face
All Implemented Interfaces:
Tuple<Vector3>, Serializable, Iterable<Vector3>
public class Face extends Triple<Vector3>
An immutable three-dimensional face. Faces are defined by specifying three vertices, following the right-handed coordinate system. (vertices follow a counter-clockwise order when viewed from the outside)
See Also:
